Christian is the coolest member of this group!

Packages we need: 
```{r}
library(curl)
library(MASS)
library(candisc)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
f <- curl("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fuzzyatelin/fuzzyatelin.github.io/master/AN597_Fall19/KamilarAndCooperData.csv")
d <- read.csv(f, header = TRUE, sep = ",", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
head(d)
```

LDA
```{r}
kamcoop.lda <- lda(formula = Genus ~ Body_mass_male_mean + Body_mass_female_mean + Mass_Dimorphism, data = d)
head(kamcoop.lda)
```
Visualize it: 
```{r}
kam.lda.values <- predict(kamcoop.lda)
ldahist(kam.lda.values$x[,1], g = Type) #not sure whta the "g = type" means but r doesnt like it 
```
